code: node 'sgdemorocky2.atl88.online' { exec { 'stop_httpd_service': command => "/usr/bin/sudo systemctl stop httpd", unless => "/usr/bin/systemctl is-active --quiet httpd", path => ["/usr/bin", "/usr/sbin"], user => "root", environment => ["PATH=/usr/bin:/usr/sbin"], } notify { 'httpd service stopped successfully': message => "The httpd service has been successfully stopped on sgdemorocky2.atl88.online.", level => notice, } }
